example[2]: ‘What is it?’ I asked, playing dumb (=pretending to be stupid).
example[3]: She’s no dumb blonde (=a pretty woman with blonde hair who seems stupid).
definition[0]: unable to speak, because you are angry, surprised, shocked etc
example[4]: He stared at the burnt-out car in dumb disbelief.
example[5]: She was struck dumb with terror.
definition[1]: someone who is dumb is not able to speak at all. Many people think that this use is offensive
